attributes.additional_details:
stop elderly people having to sell homes to pay for care
elderly care should not have to take into consideration the homes so many have saved for
 heart breaking enough to have to go into care with out this
in the end elderly can end up with nothing but the cloths they stand up in after been assessed and all assets taken it is heart breaking to be in this position  and must be stopped  it is like going back to the workhouse days
